summary_teim: Jimmy Yancey, Robert Johnson, John Hammond, and Fats Domino are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame at its inaugural ceremony. Paul Shaffer and his band perform.
summary_ssm: Jimmy Yancey, Robert Johnson, John Hammond, and Fats Domino are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame at its inaugural ceremony. Paul Shaffer and his band perform.
contents_teim: Ahmet Ertegun inducts Jimmy Yancey, introduces Mama Yancey -- Mama Yancey accepts the award -- Jann Wenner introduces music writer Robert Palmer -- Palmer inducts Robert Johnson and accepts the award (4:02) -- Ertegun inducts John Hammond and accepts the award -- Wenner inducts Fats Domino, introduces Billy Joel -- Joel inducts Domino -- Domino accepts his award (16:45) -- Ertegun inducts the Everly Brothers.
contents_ssm: Ahmet Ertegun inducts Jimmy Yancey, introduces Mama Yancey -- Mama Yancey accepts the award -- Jann Wenner introduces music writer Robert Palmer -- Palmer inducts Robert Johnson and accepts the award (4:02) -- Ertegun inducts John Hammond and accepts the award -- Wenner inducts Fats Domino, introduces Billy Joel -- Joel inducts Domino -- Domino accepts his award (16:45) -- Ertegun inducts the Everly Brothers.

abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Ahmet Ertegun introduces Jimmy Yancey -- Family of Jimmy Yancey accepts the award on his behalf -- Jann Wenner introduces Robert Johnson -- Robert Palmer inducts Robert Johnson -- Ahmet Ertegun inducts John Hammond and accepts award on his behalf -- Jann Wenner introduces Fats Domino -- Billy Joel inducts Fats Domino -- Fats Domino acceptance speech -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Everly Brothers
name_sim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation
